Html:
﻿﻿﻿﻿Hi Radioman. Which files are necessary for GMap.Net to work? Obviously these are required:

GMap.NET.Core.dll
GMap.NET.WindowsForms.dll
MySql.Data.dll

But I'm a little uncertain about these files:

BSE.Windows.Forms.dll
System.Data.SQLite.DLL

Are these required? What are they for? Thanks

• GMap.NET.Core.dll
  • GMap.NET.WindowsForms.dll || GMap.NET.WindowsPresentation.dll
  • System.Data.SQLite.DLL 

MySql.Data.dll only if you use MySql cache provider
